import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

def plot_credit_scatter_segmentations(df, features=['RISK_RATING', 'outstandings_amt']):
    # Drop rows with missing values in selected features
    df_clean = df.dropna(subset=features + ['commitments_amt', 'MODELING_SEGMENT'])

    # Commitment-based segment
    df_clean['commitment_segment'] = df_clean['commitments_amt'].apply(
        lambda x: '≤3MM' if x <= 3_000_000 else '>3MM'
    )

    # Plot 1: Commitment-based segmentation
    plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
    sns.scatterplot(
        data=df_clean,
        x=features[0],
        y=features[1],
        hue='commitment_segment',
        alpha=0.6
    )
    plt.title('Scatter Plot: Credit Features by Commitment-Based Segmentation')
    plt.grid(True)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()

    # Plot 2: Legacy segmentation
    plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
    sns.scatterplot(
        data=df_clean,
        x=features[0],
        y=features[1],
        hue='MODELING_SEGMENT',
        alpha=0.6
    )
    plt.title('Scatter Plot: Credit Features by Legacy Segmentation')
    plt.grid(True)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.decomposition import PCA
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

# Simulated agg_df structure for context (real data to be passed when available)
# agg_df = pd.read_csv('your_file.csv')  # assumed to be already loaded

def pca_from_agg_df(
    agg_df,
    features=['RISK_RATING', 'outstandings_amt'],
    commitment_col='commitments_amt',
    commitment_cutoff=3_000_000
):
    # Step 1: Preprocess
    df = agg_df.copy()
    df = df[df[commitment_col] > 0]  # remove invalid/negative commitments
    df = df.dropna(subset=features)  # drop rows with missing features

    # Step 2: Define segments
    df['segment'] = df[commitment_col].apply(
        lambda x: f'≤{commitment_cutoff/1e6:.0f}MM' if x <= commitment_cutoff else f'>{commitment_cutoff/1e6:.0f}MM'
    )

    # Step 3: Standardize and run PCA
    scaler = StandardScaler()
    X_scaled = scaler.fit_transform(df[features])
    pca = PCA(n_components=2)
    pca_result = pca.fit_transform(X_scaled)

    # Add PCA results to DataFrame
    df['PCA1'] = pca_result[:, 0]
    df['PCA2'] = pca_result[:, 1]

    # Step 4: Plot
    plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
    sns.scatterplot(data=df, x='PCA1', y='PCA2', hue='segment', alpha=0.6)
    plt.title('PCA of Credit Variables (All Records)')
    plt.xlabel('Principal Component 1')
    plt.ylabel('Principal Component 2')
    plt.legend(title='Commitment Segment')
    plt.grid(True)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()

    return df[['PCA1', 'PCA2', 'segment'] + features]
